attributes.action: BAN THE PLANNED ISLAM4UK MARCH THROUGH WOOTTON BASSETT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am not anti Muslim or racist but strongly feel that the proposed march by the Muslim extremists Islam4UK through Wootton Bassett is an insult to the servicemen that have died for their country and also the people of Wootton Bassett who show tremendous respect for the war dead.
This proposed march should be banned now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
